snippet: The Devils, who managed only 13 shots against the Rangers in their last meeting, scored 49 seconds into the game and had three goals in the third period.
abstract: New Jersey Devils defeat New York Rangers, 4-1, in NHL action.
lead_paragraph: The Devils, who managed only 13 shots against the Rangers in their last meeting, scored 49 seconds into the game and had three goals in the third period.

headline.seo: Devils Find Way to Beat Rangers’ Lundqvist
headline.main: Short on Effort and Offense, Rangers Learn Lesson Against the Devils
headline.print_headline: Short on Effort and Offense, Rangers Learn Lesson Against the Devils
